nodes.text: Shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire, the Imperial Security Bureau arrested sixty-three senators of the Delegation of 2000, who were also signatories of the Petition of 2000, which included senators Tanner Cadaman, Ivor Drake, Shea Sadashassa, Fang Zar, and Grebleips. The detained senators were charged with treason and conspiracy; accused of working with and supporting the Jedi Order to attempt to overthrow Emperor Palpatine.
